text: Sarah Phillips (born 3 July 1967) is a Scottish cyclist who competed for the United Kingdom as a road cyclist in the 1996 Summer Olympics. She participated in the women's road race and women's time trial at the 1996 Olympics, finishing 19th in the road race and 21st in the time trial. ==References== ==External links== * profile at sports-reference.com Category:Scottish female cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Great Britain Category:Living people Category:People from Stonehaven Category:1967 births Category:Sportspeople from Aberdeenshire
title: Sarah Phillips (cyclist)
